==Japanese==

===Etymology 1===
{{ja-kanjitab|てん|しょう|yomi=o}}
From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=てんしょう}} {{m|ltc|轉生}}. Compare modern {{etyl|cmn|-}} {{zh-l|轉生}}.

[[呉音#Japanese|Go'on]], so likely the original reading borrowed into Japanese. Now the less common reading of this term.

====Pronunciation====
* {{l|ja|sc=Latn|音読み|On'yomi}}
* {{IPA|lang=ja|[tẽ̞ŋɕʲo̞ː]}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|てんしょう|kyu=轉生}}

# [[transmigration]] of a [[soul]] into a new [[body]]: [[reincarnation]], [[metempsychosis]], [[rebirth]]
